description:
Riyo comes home to tell Suzu about the new Kei-o to torture her.  The new Kei-o comes from the same back ground as Suzu, but her social status is much higher than her.  Suzu starts hoping that Kei-o will come rescue her.  On the other hand, Shokei, the former princess of Ho, now endures tough manual labor as an orphan.  The orphanage’s manager also finds out Shokei’s background and blames her for the execution of her son.  Then, Shokei hears a rumor about the new Kei-o and gets jealous.  Yoko finishes the enthronement and talks to En-o, Enki and Rakushun.  She’s indecisive about the first notice to the people in Kei and Baku State leader’s issue.  But she finally manages to make a good decision... or so she thought...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 2
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Ni Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 2
風の万里 黎明の空 二章
